definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

sentences.english: The woman behind me, whoever she is, whispers about sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 我后面的女人，不知道是谁，悄声说着镇静药。

sentences.english: Hemmingway's study was at the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 后面一座是海明威的书房。

sentences.english: Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖顶和圣约翰山高地后面的，是索瓦宁森林。

sentences.english: Two bags of cement were parked behind the fence.
sentences.chinese: 两袋水泥放在围墙后面。

sentences.english: The wall behind looks a bit grey and dull.
sentences.chinese: 后面那堵墙看起来有点灰暗。

sentences.english: He took off after me, vainly trying to land a blow.
sentences.chinese: 他在后面紧追不舍，总想打到我。

sentences.english: The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.
sentences.chinese: 后面的门是在顶部铰接上的，以便可以向上开。

sentences.english: The significanceof these questions will be discussed later in this booklet.
sentences.chinese: 本手册后面会探讨这些问题的意义。

sentences.english: So when we come to personal identity which we will do in later lecture.
sentences.chinese: 所以，等到我们在后面的课上讲到人格同一性时。

sentences.english: She peered at the neighbors from behind the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 她从帘子后面凝视着邻居们。

sentences.english: Marius' two arms were passed round his neck, and the former's feet dragged behind him.
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯的双臂围着他的脖子，双足在他后面挂着。

sentences.english: We could see the sun setting behind the white pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到太阳在白塔后面落下。

sentences.english: We will re-visit these a little later in the article.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在文章的后面部分再次回顾这些内容。

sentences.english: From the back of the shoe, from the name to the tongue everything is connected.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子的后面，从牌子到鞋舌都是连在一起的。

sentences.english: The repairman apologized and threwthe bike in the back of his truck.
sentences.chinese: 修理工到了歉，把自行车放到卡车后面。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
